snippet.title: Modulus Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM AND DOWNLOAD DEMO: https://bit.ly/3RC7hGr
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/QbTr9bFqTF

Modulus is a factory automation game where you cut, color, stamp, and assemble 3D building blocks to construct massive buildings. Design and optimise sprawling factories with creative freedom to efficiently fulfill the orders of the Grand Neural Network.
